MK_Info_PowerAllot.sql: SELECT pt.ID AS ID,pr.PowerName AS PowerName,pr.Notes,pr.MenuAddress AS MenuAddress,pt.CreateUser AS CreateUser,pt.CreateDate AS CreateDate,pt.ShowMark,CASE pt.Status_xx WHEN '0' THEN '未授权' WHEN '1' THEN '授权'ELSE '未知' END AS Status_xx FROM MK_Info_PowerAllot AS pt JOIN dbo.MK_Info_PowerGroup AS pp ON pt.PowerGroupID=pp.ID AND pp.ShowMark='Y' JOIN dbo.MK_Type_Power AS pr ON pt.PowerID=pr.ID AND pr.ShowMark='Y' WHERE pt.PowerGroupID=@PowerGroupID AND pt.ShowMark='Y'
UPDATE MK_Info_PowerAllot SET Status_xx =@Status_xx WHERE pt.ID=@ID AND ShowMark='Y'
